items.content_html: The Productivity Booster Chrome extension is your ultimate tool for staying organized and focused while browsing. This lightweight and user-friendly extension provides a to-do list directly accessible from any webpage. Stay on top of your tasks with features like task completion, deletion, and persistent storage.
